short_summary: This Requirement is open to supply arrangement holders as per EN578-172870, under level 13.5 to 13.11, stream 3 - policy and advisory services of SRV category. This contract end at Septembre 2023 in 144 jour
description: This is a requirement for temporary help services for stream 3 - policy and advisory services level 13.5 to 13.11.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Temporary Help Services for Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat

 The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat has issued a request for proposal (RFP) for Temporary Help Services under the Professional and Technical support category.

### Summary:

* **Contract Reference:** PW-22-01007379
* **Contract Number:** 24062-23-098
* **Publication Date:** September 15, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 3, 2022, 14:00:00
* **Contract Category:** SRV
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Selective Tenders

### Brief Description:

Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat requires Temporary Help Services for various senior and advisory roles, including Policy and Advisory Services, Program Administration, and Strategist positions.

The successful supplier will provide resources with a minimum security clearance of Reliability, with an estimated level of effort of 144 days or 1080 hours per resource x 4 resources over the period of October 2022 to September 2023.

### Invitation to Tender:

The RFP is open to suppliers with a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) under EN578-172870. The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* 2C London Inc.
* 7792395 Canada Inc.
* 9468269 Canada Corp.
* Cloud Shift Inc.
* Contract Community Inc.
* Excel Human Resources Inc.
* GovInsights Consulting Inc.
* Lionel Drouin
* Maverin Inc.
* Northern Brainwaves Consulting Inc.
* Olav Consulting Corp
* QMR Staffing Solutions Incorporated
* SYSTEMATIX SOLUTIONS TI INC/SYSTEMATIX IT SOLUTIONS INC
* Thinkpoint Inc.

# Documents Attached:

The RFP document 24062-23-098 in English and French can be downloaded from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/15/]()
.

# Contacts:

For more information, please contact Bassam ElDaya at (343) 571-0453 or [bassam.el-daya@tbs-sct.gc.ca][1].


[1]: mailto:bassam.el-daya@tbs-sct.gc.ca
